verbose_text: LXR activation in vitro decreases the expression of miR-26 [XREF_BIBR], reversing miR-26-mediated suppression of ABCA1 and ADP ribosylation factor like 7 (ARL7), the transporter that carries cholesterol to the membrane to facilitate association with ABCA1 [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: LXR activation in vitro decreases the expression of miR-26 [ XREF_BIBR ], reversing miR-26-mediated suppression of ABCA1 and ADP-ribosylation
